about_the_game:
Hello Adventurers,

Green Hell Original Soundtrack is coming to Steam! Now you can take the jungle with you wherever you go. Give your everyday life a touch of Amazonian uncertainty! Better yet bundle it with Green Hell for you or a friend.
Green Hell OST was composed by Adam Skorupa, Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz and Michał Cielecki and it consists of 39 tracks with a total duration of 78 minutes.

WARNING: Side effects of listening to Green Hell OST my include the following:
- trying to light a campfire at home,
- building a hut in the office,
- cravings for urban fauna and flora,
- attempts to befriend rodents that might not be interested in being befriended,
- attempting to coerce strangers for joint adventuring.

The Creepy Jar team strongly recommends you to stay sane!

content_descriptors.notes: The game has mild levels of violence. The player needs to hunt for survival and fight with the enemy tribes. The player's character may consume human flesh when in extreme hunger, although it's not required nor he's encouraged to do so, as it leads to negative psychological effects. The game is depicting various diseases that will have impact on characters body. Some of their symptoms may be found disturbing. The player may also enter a hallucinating state after eating various hallucinogenic plants and mushrooms scattered around the jungle.

name: Green Hell Official Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 991 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 991 MB available space

short_description: Green Hell Soundtrack is the companion music to the awards winning Survival Sim Green Hell produced by Creepy Jar. The Album composed by Adam Skorupa, Krzysztof Wierzynkiewicz and Michał Cielecki consists of 39 tracks which will let you take the jungle vibes with you wherever you go.
